00017 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00018 /// CPuzzleNodeArtist::CPuzzleNodeArtist
00019 ///
00020 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CPuzzleNodeArtist
00021 ///                 class.
00022 /// @pre            None
00023 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00024 ///
00025 /// @param canvas:  This is the area to which all the nodes will be painted.
00026 ///
00027 /// @limitations    None
00028 ///
00029 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 CPuzzleNodeArtist::CPuzzleNodeArtist( QPaintDevice *canvas )
00031 {
00032     m_canvas = canvas;
00033     m_model = NULL;
00034     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00035  m_showHeuristics = false;
00036 }

00053 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00054 /// CPuzzleNodeArtist::drawArrow
00055 ///
00056 /// @description              This function draws an arrow indicating a start
00057 ///                           node.
00058 /// @pre                      None
00059 /// @post                     An arrow is drawn on the screen indicating the
00060 ///                           start node.
00061 ///
00062 /// @param painter:           This is a pointer to the QPainter object which
00063 ///                           draws the arrow to the screen.
00064 /// @param boundingRect:      This is the bounding rectangle of the node which
00065 ///                           is the start node.
00066 /// @param angleNorthOfEast:  This is the angle in degrees from the East
00067 ///                           direction going North to draw the arrow at.
00068 ///
00069 /// @limitations              None
00070 ///
00071 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00072 void CPuzzleNodeArtist::drawArrow( QPainter *painter, QRect &boundingRect,
00073                                    qreal angleNorthOfEast )
00074 {
00075     QMatrix backupMatrix = painter->matrix();
00076     QPen backupPen = painter->pen();
00077 
00078     QPen editPen = m_style->getPen();
00079     int w = painter->pen().width();
00080     int d = m_style->getNodeRadius() * 2;
00081 
00082     painter->translate( boundingRect.center() );
00083     painter->rotate( -angleNorthOfEast );
00084     painter->translate( (d/2)+(w*2), 0 );
00085 
00086     editPen.setCapStyle( Qt::FlatCap );
00087     painter->setPen( editPen );
00088     painter->drawLine( 5,  4, (int)(d*.60),  4 );
00089     painter->drawLine( 5, -4, (int)(d*.60), -4 );
00090 
00091     editPen.setCapStyle( Qt::SquareCap );
00092     painter->setPen( editPen );
00093     painter->drawLine( 0, 0, (int)(d*.25),  (int)(d*.25) );
00094     painter->drawLine( 0, 0, (int)(d*.25), -(int)(d*.25) );
00095 
00096     painter->setPen( backupPen );
00097     painter->setMatrix( backupMatrix );
00098 }
00099 
00100 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00101 /// CPuzzleNodeArtist::paintModel
00102 ///
00103 /// @description   This function paints all the nodes to the screen.
00104 /// @pre           None
00105 /// @post          All the nodes are drawn to the screen.
00106 ///
00107 /// @limitations   None
00108 ///
00109 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00110 void CPuzzleNodeArtist::paintModel()
00111 {
00112     if (m_model != NULL)
00113     {
00114         QPainter painter( m_canvas );
00115         for (int i = 0; i < m_model->getNodeCount(); i++)
00116         {
00117             paintNode( m_model->getNodeAt(i), &painter );
00118         }
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00123 /// CPuzzleNodeArtist::paintNode
00124 ///
00125 /// @description     This function paints a single node to the screen.  It
00126 ///                  draws the node using the given QPainter object.
00127 /// @pre             None
00128 /// @post            The given node is painted to the screen.
00129 ///
00130 /// @param node:     This is a pointer to the node to be painted to the screen.
00131 /// @param painter:  This is a pointer to the QPainter object to be used to
00132 ///                  paint the node on the screen.
00133 ///
00134 /// @limitations     None
00135 ///
00136 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00137 void CPuzzleNodeArtist::paintNode( const SPuzzleNode * node,
00138                                    QPainter *painter )
00139 {
00140     int radius = m_style->getNodeRadius();
00141     QRect rect(0, 0, radius * 2, radius * 2);
00142     rect.moveCenter(node->s_position);
00143     QPen pen = m_style->getPen();
00144     if ( node->s_flag & SPuzzleNode::EndNode )
00145         pen.setWidth( pen.width() + m_style->getBoldWidth() );
00146     painter->setPen(pen);
00147     painter->setBrush(m_style->getBrush());
00148     painter->setFont(m_style->getFont());
00149     painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00150 
00151  QString text;
00152 
00153  text.append(node->s_name);
00154 
00155  if(node->s_name.isEmpty() == false)
00156   text.append(QString(" "));
00157 
00158  if(m_showHeuristics)
00159   text.append(QString::number(node->s_heuristic));
00160 
00161     painter->drawEllipse(rect);
00162     painter->drawText(rect, Qt::AlignCenter, text);
00163     if( node->s_flag & SPuzzleNode::StartNode )
00164         drawArrow( painter, rect );
00165 }

00169 ///
00170 /// @description   This function sets the model pointer so that the painting

00174 /// @post          The model pointer is set.

00176 /// @param model:  This is a pointer to the model.
00177 ///
00178 /// @limitations   None
00179 ///
00180 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00181 void CPuzzleNodeArtist::setModel( CPuzzleGraphModel *model )
00182 {
00183     m_model = model;
00184 }

00191 /// @pre           None
00192 /// @post          Visible heuristics are toggled
00193 ///
00194 /// @param b:      Take a guess.
00195 ///
00196 /// @limitations   None
00197 ///
00198 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00199 void CPuzzleNodeArtist::toggleHeuristics(bool b)
00200 {
00201  m_showHeuristics = b;
00202 }
